events.message: I recently ordered a product but I want to request a refund because it did not meet my expectations and I no longer need it.
The case has been categorized under refund based on the customer's request for money back.
An agent was assigned to handle this refund request and respond to the customer promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for requesting the refund to proceed further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the item was different from the description and I am not satisfied.
We have reviewed your case and approved your refund. Please return the item using the prepaid shipping label we will send you shortly.
Thank you for the quick resolution. I appreciate the prepaid label; this makes the process much easier for me.
Your refund case is now resolved. Once we receive the returned product, the refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to confirm you received the prepaid return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the return label and shipped the package today. Thanks again for your help!
Your refund has been completed and the case is now closed. We hope to serve you again in the future.
We have sent a satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience and would appreciate your feedback.
